about_the_game:
Face relentless hordes in a battle for survival, playing in first-person, third-person, or top-down view.

Fight against waves of enemies, from monsters and bats to ferocious zombies. Unlock and upgrade increasingly powerful weapons as you take on intense combat rounds. Survive long enough, and you can recruit allies like a drone, a loyal sword-wielding warrior, or even a helicopter to aid you in battle.

Boost your strategy with powerful power-ups: place explosive mines, summon meteorites, or unleash devastating spells to enhance your abilities. Switch perspectives and dominate the battlefield your way. Get ready for a thrilling action experience where every round makes you stronger!
